product_name: Patagonia Mixed Guide Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Patagonia Mixed Guide Jacket combines waterproof/breathable fabric and stretchy, breathable soft-shell fabric for the best of both worlds on long ice climbs or backcountry ski tours. Waterproof, windproof and breathable H2No(R) Performance Standard fabric make up the shoulder, chest, upper arms and hood where you need it most. Lower torso is Polartec(R) Power Shield(R) stretch-woven fabric that's durable, highly breathable and wind resistant. Brushed interior for next-to-skin comfort. Helmet-compatible, 2-way-adjustable hood. Microfleece-lined neck and chin for comfort. Full-reach gusseted panels let you raise your arms without the jacket body raising up, too. 2 chest pockets have zippers with a durable water-resistant coating. Zippered handwarmer pockets are placed for harness and pack compatibility and have storm flaps for secure storage. Patagonia Mixed Guide Jacket for women has adjustable cuffs and hem to seal weather out, warmth in. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Patagonia Mixed Guide Jacket combines waterproof/breathable fabric and stretchy, breathable soft-shell fabric for the best of both worlds on long ice climbs or backcountry ski tours.
